title: The MHR Search Query Results Schema

searchId.description: Unique MHR identifier of the search generated by the MHR system.

searchDateTime.description: The date-time the system successfully completed the search.

maxResultsSize.description: Set by the Registry, the maximum number of Registrations returned in a search result. Included to indicate if the search exceeds the maximum allowed number of results.

totalResultsSize.description: The total number or Registration matches found in the Registry. If the value is greater than maxResultsSize or greater than returnedResultsSize, then not all Registration matches are included in the result set.

returnedResultsSize.description: The number of Registrations returned in the result set. The upper limit is set by maxResultsSize. If the value is less than totalResultsSize then not all Registration matches are included in the result set.

selectedResultsSize.description: The total number of matching registrations included in the detail response. Set when fetching account search history.
